content: I think I'll go with a simple yet elegant table setting with a white tablecloth, gold accents, and fresh flowers. I'll also hang family photos around the room and set up a special seating area for my grandparents. For the anniversary banner, I can use a gold balloon banner with the number "50" and my grandparents' names. I'll also play their favorite music in the background and have a special toast prepared. What do you think?
